posts.title: UPDATE: ABC's Matt Gutman issued an apology saying he "deeply regrets" calling the text messages of Charlie Kirk's alleged shooter "VERY TOUCHING"

quotedTweet.content:

ABC’s Matt Gutman says that the messages of the shooter confessing to the m*rder of Charlie Kirk were "VERY TOUCHING."

What about the confession of an alleged killer is "touching"???

Sick

Do you accept his apology?

posts.author: goldwater4ever
posts.title: UNC Asheville allowing students to promote a "be gay, do crime" event scheduled for Sept. 26

quotedTweet.content: This was just posted at UNC Asheville. Apparently "Be Gay Do Crime" is a current popular mantra among leftwing & LGBTQ college students, some sort of call for rebellion and resistance. Chilling timing ... the kids are not alright.

twitter.content:
“Be gay, do crime. Everyday acts of queer resistance and rebellion.” - hanging at @UncAvl 

This is a symbol of lgbtq t*rrorism.

They’re open about it.

The lgbtq militia openly call for violence and recruit new members for their mission.

This is becoming a really big problem.

posts.author: BallsackPaneer
posts.title: The most plausible and sensible theory isn’t that the FBI made up text messages and released them but that the killer and his boyfriend constructed this highly scripted text conversation as an alibi for the boyfriend. I don’t know that to be the case, obviously. But it’s a highly plausible scenario.

posts.title: Profoundly important point

quotedTweet.content: Note: there's not one prominent Leftist anywhere in the West doing what Charlie Kirk did, i.e. issuing an open debate challenge to all comers and saying "Here's my view, I invite you to try and prove me wrong". None of them are willing to subject their views to that scrutiny.

posts.author: BallsackPaneer
posts.title: The most plausible and sensible theory isn’t that the FBI made up text messages and released them but that the killer and his boyfriend constructed this highly scripted text conversation as an alibi for the boyfriend. I don’t know that to be the case, obviously. But it’s a highly plausible scenario.

posts.author: Taraa
posts.title: Profoundly important point

quotedTweet.content: Note: there's not one prominent Leftist anywhere in the West doing what Charlie Kirk did, i.e. issuing an open debate challenge to all comers and saying "Here's my view, I invite you to try and prove me wrong". None of them are willing to subject their views to that scrutiny.
